required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study on Bladder and Sexual Function Change After Simple Hysterectomy
clinical_study.official_title: Incidence and Pattern of Overactive Bladder Symptoms Occurring After Hysterectomy

oversight_info.authority: Korea: Asan Medical Center Institutional Review Board

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the incidence and pattern of bladder symptoms and sexual function change occuring after simple hysterectomy and to analyze the influence of bladder symptoms and sexual function change on quality of life of patients.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective

secondary_outcome.measure: Pattern change of bladder symptoms after surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and within 6 months after surgery
Baseline and within 6 months after surgery

arm_group.description: Patients will undergo simple hysterectomy due to benign uterine disease.

study_pop.textblock: Patinets who undergo simple hysterectomy due to benign uterine disease at university hospital

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients who is planed to undergo simple hysterectomy due to benign uterine disease
1. Uterine leiomyoma
2. Uterine adenomyosis
3. Endometrial hyperplasia
4. Cervical intraepithelial neoplasia (including carcinoma in situ, FIGO stage IA1 cancer)
5. Dysfunctional uterine bleeding
6. Other benign uterine disease requiring hysterectomy
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who are taking medication for overactive bladder
- Patients who underwent incontinence surgery due to urinary incontinence
- Acute or chronic infectious disease of urinary tract
- Neurologic disease causing urinary abnormality
- Previous pelvic radiation therapy
- Patients who are undergoing incontinence surgery with hysterectomy
- Pregnant woman

facility.name: Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology, University of Ulsan College of Medicine, Asan Medical Center
